nodes.text: Farana's Folly was a fathier female that mated with Etti Express, and gave birth to the fathier named Bonadan Star in 30 ABY as a result.

By around 34 ABY, Bonadan Star had become a racing fathier on the planet Cantonica. Imperial was listed as the fathier's dam on race programs, including one collected by the Resistance mechanic Rose Tico and added to her diary.
Farana's Folly was first mentioned in the 2018 replica journal The Last Jedi: Rose Tico: Resistance Fighter, which was written by Jason Fry.
